title: Crazy Fellow
overview: Abhiram is a rich, flamboyant, self-centered youngster, who lives life to the fullest. To help Abhi take charge of his future, his brother helps him get a job at a software company. Right from day one, Abhiram has a stormy relationship with his colleague Madhumita. Abhi and Madhu interact with each other through a dating app without knowing each otherâ€™s true identities. When they finally plan to meet, all hell breaks loose.
